mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT ( PNAME, BPRICE, DETAIL, DISCOUNT, DPRICE, PCATEGORY, REGID, REGDT ) VALUES ( #{pName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{detail, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{discount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dPrice, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{pCategory, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
